section.title: Slow Write Speed on Live Images
section.para: In one of our previous releases (denzil), users noticed that booting off of a live image and writing to disk was noticeably slower. This included the boot itself, especially the first one, since first boots tend to do a significant amount of writing due to certain post-install scripts.
The problem (and solution) was discovered by using the Yocto tracing tools, in this case 'perf stat', 'perf script', 'perf record' and 'perf report'.
See all the unvarnished details of how this bug was diagnosed and solved here: Yocto Bug #3049
